env.BOT_TOKEN: The Telegram bot token (Generate from BotFather).
env.BOT_USERNAME: The username you have set for your bot.
env.EMOJI_LIST: A string of emojis that the bot will use to react to messages.
env.RANDOM_LEVEL: Sets the randomness of group chat reactions; higher values mean more variability (Optional).
env.RESTRICTED_CHATS: A list of chat IDs where the bot should not react to messages (Optional).
